Activity: Log in and check emails. Review any final comments or approvals on the design documents.
Archive the finalized documents and ensure all team members have access to the latest versions.
Meet with @prod-1 to discuss next week's goals and how to transition from design to implementation.
Prepare a summary report of the week's achievements and send it to @prod-1 and @ldes-1.
Take some time to relax and browse inspirational game design websites for new ideas.
Organize your workspace and plan for the upcoming week, setting personal goals and priorities.
Wrap up the week by thanking the team for their collaboration and support via email.
Log off and enjoy the weekend.
